resource-agent.name: fence_vmware_vcloud
resource-agent.shortdesc: Fence agent for VMware vCloud Director API
resource-agent.longdesc: fence_vmware_vcloud is an I/O Fencing agent which can be used with VMware vCloud Director API to fence virtual machines.

parameter.name: action
parameter.shortdesc: Fencing action

parameter.name: inet4_only
parameter.shortdesc: Forces agent to use IPv4 addresses only

parameter.name: inet6_only
parameter.shortdesc: Forces agent to use IPv6 addresses only

parameter.name: ip
parameter.shortdesc: IP address or hostname of fencing device

parameter.name: ipaddr
parameter.shortdesc: IP address or hostname of fencing device

parameter.name: ipport
parameter.shortdesc: TCP/UDP port to use for connection with device

parameter.name: login
parameter.shortdesc: Login name

parameter.name: notls
parameter.shortdesc: Disable TLS negotiation and force SSL3.0. This should only be used for devices that do not support TLS1.0 and up.

parameter.name: passwd
parameter.shortdesc: Login password or passphrase

parameter.name: passwd_script
parameter.shortdesc: Script to run to retrieve password

parameter.name: password
parameter.shortdesc: Login password or passphrase

parameter.name: password_script
parameter.shortdesc: Script to run to retrieve password

parameter.name: plug
parameter.shortdesc: Physical plug number on device, UUID or identification of machine

parameter.name: port
parameter.shortdesc: Physical plug number on device, UUID or identification of machine

parameter.name: ssl
parameter.shortdesc: Use SSL connection with verifying certificate

parameter.name: ssl_insecure
parameter.shortdesc: Use SSL connection without verifying certificate

parameter.name: ssl_secure
parameter.shortdesc: Use SSL connection with verifying certificate

parameter.name: username
parameter.shortdesc: Login name

parameter.name: api_path
parameter.shortdesc: The path part of the API URL

parameter.name: quiet
parameter.shortdesc: Disable logging to stderr. Does not affect --verbose or --debug-file or logging to syslog.

parameter.name: verbose
parameter.shortdesc: Verbose mode

parameter.name: debug
parameter.shortdesc: Write debug information to given file

parameter.name: debug_file
parameter.shortdesc: Write debug information to given file

parameter.name: version
parameter.shortdesc: Display version information and exit

parameter.name: help
parameter.shortdesc: Display help and exit

parameter.name: separator
parameter.shortdesc: Separator for CSV created by 'list' operation

parameter.name: delay
parameter.shortdesc: Wait X seconds before fencing is started

parameter.name: login_timeout
parameter.shortdesc: Wait X seconds for cmd prompt after login

parameter.name: power_timeout
parameter.shortdesc: Test X seconds for status change after ON/OFF

parameter.name: power_wait
parameter.shortdesc: Wait X seconds after issuing ON/OFF

parameter.name: shell_timeout
parameter.shortdesc: Wait X seconds for cmd prompt after issuing command

parameter.name: retry_on
parameter.shortdesc: Count of attempts to retry power on

parameter.name: gnutlscli_path
parameter.shortdesc: Path to gnutls-cli binary
